snippet: Conventional wisdom says it is harder to quit for women, but the largest study of the claim to date finds that there is little difference in successful cessation rates among men and women.
abstract: Conventional wisdom says it is harder to quit for women, but the largest study of the claim to date finds that there is little difference in successful cessation rates among men and women.

headline.main: Really? Quitting Smoking Is Harder for Women
headline.print_headline: Really? The Claim: Quitting Smoking Is Harder For Women.
